info.name: Product Catalog
info.description: The "Product Catalog" collection is a set of APIs used to manage a product catalog. These APIs allow for basic and advanced operations to interact with product data, including viewing, adding, updating, deleting, and searching for products.

item.name: CRUD Product

request.description:
- This API is used to retrieve detailed information of a specific product by using its **`productId`**.
    
- This request includes test cases for a valid `productId`, an invalid `productId` (incorrect format), and a `productId` that does not find a product.

response.name: Get Product By ProductID - Valid
Get Product By ProductID - Invalid ProductID
Get Product By ProductID - ProductID not found

request.description:
- This API is used to retrieve a list of all products in the system.
    
- This request tests both cases where products are returned and where no products are returned.

response.name: View All Products - Valid -Return Products - MISS

response.name: View All Products - Valid - Empty

request.description:
- This API is used to create a new product in system. The product data is sent in the request body.
    
- This requests tests successfully cases and errors cases such as an empty/duplicate/too short/too long product name, an empty/too long description, an empty/negative/zero/too high price, and an empty/invalid category.

response.name: Create New Product - Valid
Create New Product - Blank Name
Create New Product - Duplicate name
Create New Product - Too short name
Create New Product - Too long name
Create New Product - Blank Description
Create New Product - Too long description
Create New Product - Null price
Create New Product - Zero price
Create New Product - Negative price
Create New Product - Exceed max (>999999.99)
Create New Product - Blank Category
Create New Product - Invalid value

request.description:
- This API is used to update the information of an existing product in the system, based on its `productId`.
    
- This request tests cases for successful updates, duplicate product names, invalid `productId`, and product not found.

response.name: Update product - Valid
Update product - Duplicate product name
Update product - invalid ObjectId
Update product - Not found case
Update product - Too short name
Update product - Description blank
Update product - Exceed Price
Update product - Invalid category

request.description:
- This API is used to delete a product from the catalog based on its `productId`.
    
- This request tests cases for successful deletion, invalid `productId`, and product not found.

response.name: Delete product by productID - Valid
Delete product by productID - Invalid Product ID
Delete product by productID - Product ID not found

item.description: This is a folder containing requests related to CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a single product/list of products.

item.name: Filter/Sort Product

request.description:
- This API allows for filtering products by category and sorting the results by name or price, in either ascending or descending order (ASC/DESC).
    
- This request tests successful cases for filtering and sorting.

response.name: Base Case
Sort Name ASC - Valid
Sort Name DESC - Valid
Sort Price ASC - Valid
Sort Price DESC - Valid
Filter + Sort - Valid
Sort field - Invalid

request.description:
- This API is used to filter products by a specific category.
    
- This request tests cases for successful filtering, invalid categories, and when no products are found in that category.

response.name: Only Filter - Valid - MISS
Only Filter - Valid - HIT
